enchantment.uniquee.alchemists_grace.des: Hitting an Enemy or Mining a Block will grant you Potion Effects
enchantment.uniquee.ares_blessing.desc: Lethal Damage will be converted into Durability Loss of the Armor, yet Fall & Magic Damage will still go through
enchantment.uniquee.ameliorated_bane_of_: An Advanced Version of Bane of Arthropod
enchantment.uniquee.berserker.desc: The lower your Health, the higher your Damage
enchantment.uniquee.bone_crusher.desc: Increased Damage and Looting against bare-chested Skeletons
Weapons will react to temperature and receive effects of the counterpart.
enchantment.uniquee.cloud_walker.desc: Sneaking changes the Mode(Toggle). When active Player can no longer fall for a while. Consumes Durability while active
enchantment.uniquee.deaths_odium.desc: Upon death, transfer some Health to the Item, while in an active Slot. Maybe this can be used in my favor
enchantment.uniquee.ecological.desc: Standing near Wood(Logs) & Leaves, will recover slowly the durability of your tool.
enchantment.uniquee.ender_eyes.desc: Looking at Endermen keeps them from teleporting and won't make them angry
enchantment.uniquee.ender_librarian.desc: Shift-Rightclicking with a Map will teleport you in a random spot in the Map, Treasuremap will teleport you more precise to the Location. The Item will be consumed
enchantment.uniquee.ender_mending.desc: Improved Version of Mending, will store exceeding Experience in the Tool. Ender Mending will split it's Experience to every Item that has either Ender Mending or Mending
enchantment.uniquee.ender_marksmen.desc: Hitting a target with a Bow, will replenish Durability and grant your Arrow back
enchantment.uniquee.endest_reap.desc: Deals bonus magic damage for every Reaped Stack. Gains a Stack for every 'higher being'
enchantment.uniquee.fast_food.desc: Living Animals/Passives wont drop anything but therefore replenish Hunger, affected by Looting and fire
enchantment.uniquee.focused_impact.desc: The lower your Attack Speed, the more Damage you deal
enchantment.uniquee.grimoire.desc: Improves Enchantments by Player's Knowledge. After this Enchantment is applied, every Enchantment added after will be removed(including Level increase)
enchantment.uniquee.icarus_aegis.desc: Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil will consume all Feathers in your Inventory, Fall Damage by gliding will be negated
enchantment.uniquee.ifrits_grace.desc: Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil will consume all Lava/Magma related Blocks in you Inventory and store it as "Lava Power". Mining a Block will consume Lava Power, mining an Ore will consume even more. Therefore the Drops will be smelted.
enchantment.uniquee.midas_blessing.desc: Shift-Rightclicking an Anvil will consume all of your Gold in your Inventory. Mining an oreGem, will consume Gold, but double the drops.
enchantment.uniquee.momentum.desc: Continued mining will further increase your Mining Speed per Block mined. Accelerates faster with higher levels and Block Hardness
enchantment.uniquee.natures_grace.desc: Standing near Leaves will restore Health, as long as the Player didnt receive Damage recently
enchantment.uniquee.perpetual_strike.des: Your damage increases with every consecutive hit on the same Target
enchantment.uniquee.pestilences_odium.de: Non-Hostile Entities in your area will be continuously damaged
enchantment.uniquee.phoenixs_blessing.de: Upon death, will resurrect you with full Health and Hunger, nearby Enemies will burn. There is an everlasting Hate between Phoenix's and Death
enchantment.uniquee.range.desc: Increases Reach, but will reduce Mining Speed when the bonus Reach is in use
enchantment.uniquee.sages_blessing.desc: Increases XP but also adds Exhaustion from time to time
enchantment.uniquee.smart_ass.desc: Mining Gravel, Sand or Logs, will break the top block first
enchantment.uniquee.spartan_weapon.desc: You deal bonus magic damage while wielding a Shield
enchantment.uniquee.swift.desc: Grants you more Movement Speed but you consume more Hunger
enchantment.uniquee.swift_blade.desc: The higher your Attack Speed, the more Damage you deal
enchantment.uniquee.treasurers_eyes.desc: With this Enchantment you'll see Special Effects on Entities, depending on the Enchantments on it. Only certain Enchantment have Effects
enchantment.uniquee.warriors_grace.desc: Killing an Entity will replenish Durability scaling with the Max HP of the Entity
tooltip.uniquee.stored.feather.name: Stored Feathers: %s
tooltip.uniquee.stored.gold.name: Stored Gold: %s
tooltip.uniquee.stored.lava.name: Stored Lava: %s
tooltip.uniquee.stored.reap.name: Stored Reap: %s
tooltip.uniquee.stored.repair.name: Stored Repairs: %s
